name: QT
description:
QT is a 3 part game about hanging out in cute places and finding your favorite friends.

If you like cute friends and non-traditional gameplay then this is for you · ◡ ·

Cool Features:

  • 3 cute games (QT, MUSEUM and KOUEN)
  • Hundreds of friends to meet · ◡ ·
  • Over 60 fun achievements
  • Short game! Complete the base game in a couple of hours
  • A billion secrets to uncover
